content: yarn and pull through leaving end of yarn long for sewing edges together fold in half from last st use long end of yarn to sew edges together block to shape if desired © akabekobotan 2016 e barbels make 2 using a knitting bee/knitting nancy make a cord approximately 25cm long with yellow yarn run end of yarn though top loops and pull tight leave end of yarn long for sewing up f ventral fin piece a make 3 using yellow yarn start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 double_crochet to end of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st single_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st rounds 3-4 double_crochet to end of round 9 st slip_stitch break off yarn and use invisible fasten_off flatten piece b will be joined to 3x piece a using yellow yarn start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 double_crochet to end of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st single_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st rounds 3-4 double_crochet to end of round 9 st do not fasten_off flatten so that final st of round is on the right side see below left assembly round 1 line up the previously made piece a s with piece b at the far right and work 5 double_crochet across the front side of each of the 4 pieces see above top right bottom right turn work and continue double_crochet across the top of the reverse side 39 st © akabekobotan 2016 round 2 double_crochet * 3 double_crochet decrease ** repeat * to ** to end of round round 3 double_crochet to end of round round 4 double_crochet * decrease 2dc ** repeat * to ** to end of round rounds 5-6 double_crochet to end of round round 7 double_crochet * decrease double_crochet ** repeat * to ** to end of round slip_stitch break off yarn use invisible fasten_off and leave yarn end long for sewing up g dorsal fin piece a using yellow yarn start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 double_crochet to end of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st round 3 double_crochet to end of round 9 st round 4 * 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * ** to end of round 12 st rounds 5-6 double_crochet to end of round 12 st slip_stitch break off yarn and use invisible fasten_off flatten piece b using yellow yarn start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 double_crochet to end of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st round 3 double_crochet to end of round 9 st round 4 * 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * ** to end of round
